document.full_text: tunisian authorities have filed new charges against ousted leader zine al-abidine ben ali and his wife over the killing of protesters during the revolt against his rule, the official tap news agency reported wednesday.
document.title: tunisia's ousted leader charged over shooting deaths
lines_and_colors: tunisian authorities have filed new charges against ousted leader zine al-abidine ben ali and his wife over the killing of protesters during the revolt against his rule, the official tap news agency reported wednesday.
